description:
Redheads are always such a treat because they are so rare.
When I first met Nelson, he was wearing a t-shirt and shorts. He has pale white skin and I immediately noticed the light red hair on his arms and legs. He's a tall guy at 6'2", but he has a boyish face and quiet demeanor.
I wanted to get him undressed so I could see what the rest of him looked like.
First went the shirt. Wow! He's got an incredible build. Not overly muscular, but nice, symmetrical, and lean. He's got no hair on his chest or stomach, just a little red fuzz.
Then the pants. Then the underwear.
Shaved clean.
Damn it. I wanted to see a big red bush.
"Your pubes are all shaved off," I commented.
"Yeah."
"How come?" I asked.
"Cuz."
Well, what he lacks in pubic hair he more than makes up for in ejaculatory ability. The fucker shoots his wad clear over his shoulder!
"Any chance we could get you to grow your pubes back in?" I asked afterward.
"Probably not," he replied.
OK, not a big talker, but cute as can be!
title: Nelson
